additional_info:
Storeroom, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, Security, Alarm System, Elevator, Heating system: central, electricity, Hot water: gas 
 a great flat (159 sq.m),  7th floor, in new-built house at Chavchavadze Av., with 2 bedrooms and a very light, airy living/dining room with balcony, perfect for sun-bathing and relaxing. The bedrooms also have separate balconies.
Kitchen is fully fitted with all modern appliances and has a  dining area.  
Flat has one big bathroom with bath and toilet, also having separate toilet for guests.
Private parking place in underground garage of the building.
-	Central heating
-	 Air conditioning 
-	Wash machine
The flat is in a lovely small block in a peaceful residential area. There is a beautiful wood just behind the flat, and a local Vake Park just 5 minutes walk from the flat. The Turtle lake is 15 minutes walk from the building. The place is very safe, clean, friendly green area. Supermarket is 3 min. away.The bus stops are also 3 min. away from the flat. 
 The flat is only available for long term residency (min. 2 years)

details.address: Tbilisi, Vake-Saburtalo,  Vake, I. Chavchavadze Ave.
